name: Remove Twitter Blackout Not Logged-In Overlay
description:
If you are not logged in to Twitter you may notice a log-in sign-up dialogue in the middle of the screen, furthermore a blackout overlay surrounds the log-in (sign-up) so you can't see the content unless you close it. This style removes that log-in sign-up prompt along with the blackout.

Screen-shot is WITHOUT the style applied

user.name: Transhumanity
user.about: I am Singularity Utopia. This Transhumanity userstyles profile is where I place my less important styles to avoid cluttering my main profile. I am interested in AI risk, I think there is zero risk. I'm sure the Singularity will entail utopia Tweet something to me at @2045singularity if you have questions or compliments. You can also find me on G+, mainly via my page Singularity 2045.
